languages.text: "Не беспокойся, шерин, я и без твоего пинка собиралась именно так и поступить. Но раз уж мы тут в Темном городе неустанно танцуем на острие ятагана... Потерпи мои капризы. А после я избавлю тебя от них, как добрая кружка {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}рекафа{/g} поутру избавляет от дурных сновидений".

traits.locale_text: "Не беспокойся, шерин, я и без твоего пинка собиралась именно так и поступить. Но раз уж мы тут в Темном Городе неустанно танцуем на острие ятагана... Потерпи мои капризы. А после я избавлю тебя от них, как добрая кружка {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}рекафа{/g} поутру избавляет от дурных сновидений".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Never fear, shereen, I was planning to do just that even without any prodding from you. But while we're here in the Dark City dancing on a scimitar's edge... humour me, will you? And after, I'll put all my airs and graces back on again, and the memory of this Jae will be blown away like the cobwebs of a bad dream after a strong mug of {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Не беспокойся, шерин, я и без твоего пинка собиралась именно так и поступить. Но раз уж мы тут в Темном городе неустанно танцуем на острие ятагана... Потерпи мои капризы. А после я избавлю тебя от них, как добрая кружка {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}рекафа{/g} поутру избавляет от дурных сновидений".

traits.locale_text: "You need not worry, shereen, this is what I was going to do even before you kicked me. But since we are dancing on the scimitar's edge here in the Dark City... Indulge my whims for a while before I rid you of them like a mug of {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g} rids a man of clinging nightmares in the morning."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You need not worry, shereen, this is what I was going to do even before you kicked me. But since we are dancing on the scimitar's edge here in the Dark City... Indulge my whims for a while before I rid you of them like a mug of {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g} rids a man of clinging nightmares in the morning."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Never fear, shereen, I was planning to do just that even without any prodding from you. But while we're here in the Dark City dancing on a scimitar's edge... humour me, will you? And after, I'll put all my airs and graces back on again, and the memory of this Jae will be blown away like the cobwebs of a bad dream after a strong mug of {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaff{/g}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Never fear, shereen, I was planning to do just that even without any prodding from you. But while we're here in the Dark City dancing on a scimitar's edge... humour me, will you? And after, I'll put all my airs and graces back on again, and the memory of this Jae will be blown away like the cobwebs of a bad dream after a strong mug of {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaff{/g}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Never fear, shereen, I was planning to do just that even without any prodding from you. But while we're here in the Dark City dancing on a scimitar's edge... humour me, will you? And after, I'll put all my airs and graces back on again, and the memory of this Jae will be blown away like the cobwebs of a bad dream after a strong mug of {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “别怕，亲爱的。就算没有你的催促，我也打算这么做。不过，当我们在黑暗之城的刀尖上跳舞时……请你迁就一下我，好吗？等这一切结束之后，我会恢复我以往的举止与风度。而关于这个婕伊的记忆将会被风吹走，就像喝了杯浓烈的{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}雷卡咖啡{/g}之后，做了个噩梦一样。梦醒之后，什么都不会留下。”
languages.original_text: "Never fear, shereen, I was planning to do just that even without any prodding from you. But while we're here in the Dark City dancing on a scimitar's edge... humour me, will you? And after, I'll put all my airs and graces back on again, and the memory of this Jae will be blown away like the cobwebs of a bad dream after a strong mug of {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “别怕，亲爱的。就算没有你的催促，我也打算这么做。不过，当我们在黑暗之城的刀尖上跳舞时……请你迁就一下我，好吗？等这一切结束之后，我会恢复我以往的举止与风度。而关于这个婕伊的记忆将会被风吹走，就像喝了杯浓烈的{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}雷卡咖啡{/g}之后，做了个噩梦一样。梦醒之后，什么都不会留下。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Never fear, shereen, I was planning to do just that even without any prodding from you. But while we're here in the Dark City dancing on a scimitar's edge... humour me, will you? And after, I'll put all my airs and graces back on again, and the memory of this Jae will be blown away like the cobwebs of a bad dream after a strong mug of recaf."

languages.text: «No tema, shereen, porque planeaba hacerlo sin sus comentarios. Pero, ya que estamos en la Ciudad Siniestra, bailando al filo de la cimitarra... permítamelo. Después, volveré a actuar toda elegante y educada, y el recuerdo de esta Jae desaparecerá como las telarañas de una pesadilla tras una buena taza de {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}café{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Never fear, shereen, I was planning to do just that even without any prodding from you. But while we're here in the Dark City dancing on a scimitar's edge... humour me, will you? And after, I'll put all my airs and graces back on again, and the memory of this Jae will be blown away like the cobwebs of a bad dream after a strong mug of {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «No tema, shereen, porque planeaba hacerlo sin sus comentarios. Pero, ya que estamos en la Ciudad Siniestra, bailando al filo de la cimitarra... permítamelo. Después, volveré a actuar toda elegante y educada, y el recuerdo de esta Jae desaparecerá como las telarañas de una pesadilla tras una buena taza de {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}café{/g}».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「恐れることはないわ、シャリーン。あんたから勧められなくとも、そうするつもりだったんだ。でも、この仄暗き都でシミターの刃の上で踊っている間は…あたしを楽しませてくれないかい？そのあと、あたしはまた優雅さと気品を取り戻し、このジェイの記憶は、マグカップで{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}模造コーヒー{/g}を飲んだあとの悪い夢のクモの巣のように吹き飛んでしまうだろうから」
languages.original_text: "Never fear, shereen, I was planning to do just that even without any prodding from you. But while we're here in the Dark City dancing on a scimitar's edge... humour me, will you? And after, I'll put all my airs and graces back on again, and the memory of this Jae will be blown away like the cobwebs of a bad dream after a strong mug of {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「恐れることはないわ、シャリーン。あんたから勧められなくとも、そうするつもりだったんだ。でも、この仄暗き都でシミターの刃の上で踊っている間は…あたしを楽しませてくれないかい？そのあと、あたしはまた優雅さと気品を取り戻し、このジェイの記憶は、マグカップで{g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}模造コーヒー{/g}を飲んだあとの悪い夢のクモの巣のように吹き飛んでしまうだろうから」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Fürchtet Euch nicht, Shereen, genau das hatte ich auch ohne Eure Ermutigung vor. Doch während wir hier in der Dunklen Stadt auf der Klinge eines Krummsäbels tanzen ... Seid so nett, ja? Und danach verhalte ich mich wieder so etepetete wie eh und je, und die Erinnerung an diese Jae wird weggepustet wie die Spinnweben eines Albtraums nach einer starken Tasse {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}Rekaf{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Never fear, shereen, I was planning to do just that even without any prodding from you. But while we're here in the Dark City dancing on a scimitar's edge... humour me, will you? And after, I'll put all my airs and graces back on again, and the memory of this Jae will be blown away like the cobwebs of a bad dream after a strong mug of {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Fürchtet Euch nicht, Shereen, genau das hatte ich auch ohne Eure Ermutigung vor. Doch während wir hier in der Dunklen Stadt auf der Klinge eines Krummsäbels tanzen ... Seid so nett, ja? Und danach verhalte ich mich wieder so etepetete wie eh und je, und die Erinnerung an diese Jae wird weggepustet wie die Spinnweben eines Albtraums nach einer starken Tasse {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}Rekaf{/g}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « N'ayez crainte, shereen. Vous n'avez pas besoin de me l'ordonner, c'est exactement ce que je comptais faire. Je vous demande simplement de m'accorder un répit tant que nous sommes en train de danser sur le fil du rasoir dans la Cité Crépusculaire. Ensuite, j'enfilerai à nouveau mon déguisement bienséant et le souvenir de cette Jae s'estompera comme l'arrière-goût d'un mauvais rêve après une tasse de {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaff{/g} bien corsé. »
languages.original_text: "Never fear, shereen, I was planning to do just that even without any prodding from you. But while we're here in the Dark City dancing on a scimitar's edge... humour me, will you? And after, I'll put all my airs and graces back on again, and the memory of this Jae will be blown away like the cobwebs of a bad dream after a strong mug of {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « N'ayez crainte, shereen. Vous n'avez pas besoin de me l'ordonner, c'est exactement ce que je comptais faire. Je vous demande simplement de m'accorder un répit tant que nous sommes en train de danser sur le fil du rasoir dans la Cité Crépusculaire. Ensuite, j'enfilerai à nouveau mon déguisement bienséant et le souvenir de cette Jae s'estompera comme l'arrière-goût d'un mauvais rêve après une tasse de {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaff{/g} bien corsé. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Hiç korkma şirinim, senden herhangi bir teşvik gelmeseydi de tam olarak bunu yapmayı planlıyordum. Burada, Kara Şehir'de kılıcın ucundayken beni idare ediver, olur mu? Sonrasında havamı ve endamımı geri toplarım, bu Jae'ın anısı da sert bir bardak {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}kahfe{/g} sonrası aklından uzaklaşan bir kâbus gibi uçar gider."
languages.original_text: "Never fear, shereen, I was planning to do just that even without any prodding from you. But while we're here in the Dark City dancing on a scimitar's edge... humour me, will you? And after, I'll put all my airs and graces back on again, and the memory of this Jae will be blown away like the cobwebs of a bad dream after a strong mug of {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}recaf{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Hiç korkma şirinim, senden herhangi bir teşvik gelmeseydi de tam olarak bunu yapmayı planlıyordum ama burada, Kara Şehir'de, bize doğru uzanan kılıçların ucundayken beni idare ediver, olur mu? Sonrasında havamı ve endamımı geri toplarım ve bu Jae'ın anısı, sert bir bardak {g|Encyclopedia:Recaf}kahfe{/g} sonrası aklından uzaklaşan bir kâbus gibi uçar gider."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
